includedAssets.title: Pilot
includedAssets.synopsis: Criminal law professor and renowned lawyer Annalise Keating recruits five of her students to work for her firm.

includedAssets.title: It's All Her Fault
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep2 - It's All Her Fault

includedAssets.title: Smile, or Go to Jail
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep3 - Smile, or Go to Jail

includedAssets.title: We're Not Friends
includedAssets.synopsis: Annalise and the team defend a minor who has shot and killed his father, a police officer. Sam and Annalise clash over Lila.

includedAssets.title: Season 1
includedAssets.synopsis: Criminal defence lawyer and professor Annalise Keating recruits five of the top students from her “How to Get Away with Murder” class to intern at her firm. The students soon find a very practical scenario to test their new skills. Critically acclaimed drama starring Viola Davis, Billy Brown and Alfred Enoch.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Lawyer and professor Annalise Keating recruits five students as interns. They soon find a very practical scenario to test their new skills.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Criminal defence lawyer and professor Annalise Keating recruits five of the top students from her “How to Get Away with Murder” class to intern at her firm. The students soon find a very practical scenario to test their new skills. Critically acclaimed drama starring Viola Davis, Billy Brown and Alfred Enoch.
